segments.text: Is everything ready for the big family barbecue tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . The steaks and chicken are marinated and I also bought hamburger buns .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should also cook a couple dozen hot dogs and kebabs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , good idea.We can put some lawn furniture outside next to the grill . I also set up the tent outside so we can hide from the sun if it gets too hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I asked Grace to bring cups and serviettes as she is also bringing two big coolers for the beers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is gonna be a great barbecue !
segments.speaker: S2
